18#include <sys/cdefs.h>
19__RCSID("$NetBSD: print.c,v 1.1.1.6 2018/02/06 01:53:08 christos Exp $");
20
21#include "portable.h"
22
23#include <stdio.h>
24
25#include <ac/ctype.h>
26#include <ac/stdarg.h>
27#include <ac/string.h>
28#include <ac/time.h>
29
30#include "ldap-int.h"
31
32/*
33 * ldap log
34 */
35
36static int ldap_log_check( LDAP *ld, int loglvl )
37{
38 int errlvl;
39
40 if(ld == NULL) {
41 errlvl = ldap_debug;
42 } else {
43 errlvl = ld->ld_debug;
44 }
45
46 return errlvl & loglvl ? 1 : 0;
47}
48
49int ldap_log_printf( LDAP *ld, int loglvl, const char *fmt, ... )
50{
51 char buf[ 1024 ];
52 va_list ap;
53
54 if ( !ldap_log_check( ld, loglvl )) {
55 return 0;
56 }
57
58 va_start( ap, fmt );
59
60 buf[sizeof(buf) - 1] = '\0';
61 vsnprintf( buf, sizeof(buf)-1, fmt, ap );
62
63 va_end(ap);
64
65 (*ber_pvt_log_print)( buf );
66 return 1;
67}
68
